ai-patthana14.26:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.26:1.1_0: by seeing, by seeing, by seeing, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.26:1.1_1: One gives rise to vision should not be given up and not seeing causes with vision to be given up.
ai-patthana14.26:1.1_2: Equanimity should be given up by seeing is to be given up by seeing, and by not seeing reasons with cause and reasons.
ai-patthana14.26:2.1_0: by not seeing the Dhamma you should give up seeing, and by seeing causes and reasons.
ai-patthana14.26:3.1_0: Eyeing by seeing is to be given up and vision. One should give up by seeing causes and by seeing reasons.
ai-patthana14.26:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.26:4.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
